content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_bed

thought: To craft a brown bed, I need to place three brown wool blocks above three planks. I have a stripped jungle log at slot 28, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: To solve this task I need to craft a brown_bed. Brown beds require placing 3 brown_wool above 3 oak_planks|spruce_planks|birch_planks|jungle_planks|acacia_planks|dark_oak_planks|crimson_planks|warped_planks. Therefore I will first need to move the brown_wool from slot 24 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1
